title: Sakura Shower over the Modern Koi Sanctuary
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, 9:16 vertical aspect ratio. A serene Japanese-style garden featuring a large, vibrant koi pond. Numerous colorful koi fish (Kohaku, Sanke, Ogon) swim below the surface, creating visible concentric ripples. Pink cherry blossom (sakura) petals are gently falling and floating on the clear blue water. A small, arched wooden bridge (taikobashi) crosses the pond inlet. The pond is surrounded by large, mossy garden stones and lush green landscaping, including tall bamboo stalks. In the background, a minimalist, modern concrete and glass villa/house overlooks the garden. Bright daylight, soft shadows, volumetric lighting, clean lines, detailed background, Modern Anime style.
